title: Public interest
context: ยง431:1-102 Public interest. The business of insurance is one affected by the public interest, requiring that all persons be actuated by good faith, abstain from deception and practice honesty and equity in all insurance matters. Upon the insurer, the insured and their representatives rests the duty of preserving inviolate the integrity of insurance. [L 1987, c 347, pt of ยง2]
